hint: A structure built to span a physical obstacle like a body of water or road
A type of vehicle that moves along tracks in the street and is pulled by cables
A large body of water that is partly surrounded by land
A place where you can see fish and other sea animals in tanks
A building where you can look at important objects from history, science, or art
Large sea animals that often rest on docks and make loud barking noises
A platform that extends from the shore into the water, used as a place to walk or dock boats
